long_desc.thetext: The website table widget is somehow not self explaining so we should add one or two samples to showcase how it could be used.
We could use this sample e.g. http://codepen.io/anon/pen/VYRdVK

I had to fix 2 issues before that example work. Firstly I adjusted the column index check so that the index 0 will return true. Afterwards I replaced the getTextContent method with textContent || innerText.
